00029 class utility

00037     public static function jsAlert($str_message)
00038     {
00039         if (!$str_message) {
00040             return;
00041         }
00042 
00043         // replace newline with javascripts newline
00044         $str_message = str_replace("\n", '\n', $str_message);
00045         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00046         echo 'alert("'.addslashes($str_message).'")'."\n";
00047         echo '</script>'."\n";
00048     }

00057     public static function loadSettings($obj_db)
00058     {
00059         global $sysconf;
00060         $_setting_query = $obj_db->query('SELECT * FROM setting');
00061         if (!$obj_db->errno) {
00062             while ($_setting_data = $_setting_query->fetch_assoc()) {
00063                 $_value = unserialize($_setting_data['setting_value']);
00064                 if (is_array($_value)) {
00065                     foreach ($_value as $_idx=>$_curr_value) {
00066                         $sysconf[$_setting_data['setting_name']][$_idx] = $_curr_value;
00067                     }
00068                 } else {
00069                     $sysconf[$_setting_data['setting_name']] = $_value;
00070                 }
00071             }
00072         }
00073     }

00083     public static function havePrivilege($str_module_name, $str_privilege_type = 'r')
00084     {
00085         // checking checksum
00086         if ($_SESSION['checksum'] != md5($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'].SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin')) {
00087             return false;
00088         }
00089         // check privilege type
00090         if (!in_array($str_privilege_type, array('r', 'w'))) {
00091             return false;
00092         }
00093         if (isset($_SESSION['priv'][$str_module_name][$str_privilege_type]) AND $_SESSION['priv'][$str_module_name][$str_privilege_type]) {
00094             return true;
00095         }
00096         return false;
00097     }
00098

00110     public static function writeLogs($obj_db, $str_log_type, $str_value_id, $str_location, $str_log_msg)
00111     {
00112         if (!$obj_db->error) {
00113             // log table
00114             $_log_date = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00115             $_log_table = 'system_log';
00116             // filter input
00117             $str_log_type = $obj_db->escape_string(trim($str_log_type));
00118             $str_value_id = $obj_db->escape_string(trim($str_value_id));
00119             $str_location = $obj_db->escape_string(trim($str_location));
00120             $str_log_msg = $obj_db->escape_string(trim($str_log_msg));
00121             // insert log data to database
00122             @$obj_db->query('INSERT INTO '.$_log_table.'
00123             VALUES (NULL, \''.$str_log_type.'\', \''.$str_value_id.'\', \''.$str_location.'\', \''.$str_log_msg.'\', \''.$_log_date.'\')');
00124         }
00125     }

00139     public static function getID($obj_db, $str_table_name, $str_id_field, $str_value_field, $str_value, &$arr_cache = false)
00140     {
00141         $str_value = trim($str_value);
00142         if ($arr_cache) {
00143             if (isset($arr_cache[$str_value])) {
00144                 return $arr_cache[$str_value];
00145             }
00146         }
00147         if (!$obj_db->error) {
00148             $id_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT '.$str_id_field.' FROM '.$str_table_name.' WHERE '.$str_value_field.'=\''.$obj_db->escape_string($str_value).'\'');
00149             if ($id_q->num_rows > 0) {
00150                 $id_d = $id_q->fetch_row();
00151                 unset($id_q);
00152                 // cache
00153                 if ($arr_cache) {
00154                     $arr_cache[$str_value] = $id_d[0];
00155                 }
00156                 return $id_d[0];
00157             } else {
00158                 $_curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00159                 // if not found then we insert it as new value
00160                 $obj_db->query('INSERT IGNORE INTO '.$str_table_name.' ('.$str_value_field.', input_date, last_update)
00161                     VALUES (\''.$obj_db->escape_string($str_value).'\', \''.$_curr_date.'\', \''.$_curr_date.'\')');
00162                 if (!$obj_db->error) {
00163                     // cache
00164                     if ($arr_cache) {
00165                         $arr_cache[$str_value] = $obj_db->insert_id;
00166                     }
00167                     return $obj_db->insert_id;
00168                 }
00169             }
00170         }
00171     }

00180     public static function isMobileBrowser()
00181     {
00182         $_is_mobile_browser = '0';
00183 
00184         if(preg_match('/(up.browser|up.link|mmp|symbian|smartphone|midp|wap|phone)/i', strtolower(@$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']))) {
00185             $_is_mobile_browser++;
00186         }
00187 
00188         if((strpos(strtolower(@$_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT']),'application/vnd.wap.xhtml+xml')>0) or ((isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_WAP_PROFILE']) or isset($_SERVER['HTTP_PROFILE'])))) {
00189             $_is_mobile_browser++;
00190         }
00191 
00192         $_mobile_ua = strtolower(substr(@$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'],0,4));
00193         $_mobile_agents = array(
00194             'w3c ','acs-','alav','alca','amoi','audi','avan','benq','bird','blac',
00195             'blaz','brew','cell','cldc','cmd-','dang','doco','eric','hipt','inno',
00196             'ipaq','java','jigs','kddi','keji','leno','lg-c','lg-d','lg-g','lge-',
00197             'maui','maxo','midp','mits','mmef','mobi','mot-','moto','mwbp','nec-',
00198             'newt','noki','oper','palm','pana','pant','phil','play','port','prox',
00199             'qwap','sage','sams','sany','sch-','sec-','send','seri','sgh-','shar',
00200             'sie-','siem','smal','smar','sony','sph-','symb','t-mo','teli','tim-',
00201             'tosh','tsm-','upg1','upsi','vk-v','voda','wap-','wapa','wapi','wapp',
00202             'wapr','webc','winw','winw','xda','xda-');
00203 
00204         if(in_array($_mobile_ua, $_mobile_agents)) {
00205             $_is_mobile_browser++;
00206         }
00207 
00208         if (isset($_SERVER['ALL_HTTP']) && strpos(strtolower($_SERVER['ALL_HTTP']),'operamini')>0) {
00209             $_is_mobile_browser++;
00210         }
00211 
00212         if (strpos(strtolower(@$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']),' ppc;')>0) {
00213             $_is_mobile_browser++;
00214         }
00215 
00216         if (strpos(strtolower(@$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']),'windows ce')>0) {
00217             $_is_mobile_browser++;
00218         }
00219 
00220         if (strpos(strtolower(@$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']),'windows')>0) {
00221             $_is_mobile_browser=0;
00222         }
00223 
00224         if (strpos(strtolower(@$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']),'iemobile')>0) {
00225             $_is_mobile_browser++;
00226         }
00227 
00228         if ($_is_mobile_browser > 0) {
00229             return true;
00230         }
00231         return false;
00232     }

00240     public static function isMemberLogin()
00241     {
00242         $_logged_in = false;
00243         $_logged_in = isset($_SESSION['mid']) && isset($_SESSION['m_name']) && isset($_SESSION['m_email']);
00244         return $_logged_in;
00245     }
